ygData.subject: Re: PoA bard quests plus a rant
ygData.msgSnippet: Either way the prohblem of the matter is you have people complaining over a legititment problem and then you have people complaining they never get something
ygData.messageBody:
Either way the prohblem of the matter is you have people complaining over a
legititment problem and then you have people complaining they never get
something new. So I'll put this simple see the diffrence? See who deserves
the change?

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: RaceFace <bean@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, January 25, 2000 12:21 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] PoA bard quests plus a rant


>From: "RaceFace" <bean@...>
>
>Yes, of course you can assume that. Doesn't make you right, though.
>
>> From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>>
>> Heh of course I can assume the majority of people are gonna raise in
>level.
>> Either way there are problems that need to be fixed even if the kmajority
>> people aren't at such and such level. And right now the flat out truth of
>> the matteri s that overcrowding is at it's worse for high levels.
>>
>> Naeeldar
>>

>So

want

>> >>
>> >>Naeeldar

customers

has
